data.strFullDescription:
[b]Noita[/b] is a magical action roguelite set in a world where every pixel is physically simulated. Fight, explore, melt, burn, freeze and evaporate your way through the procedurally generated world using spells you've created yourself. Explore a variety of environments ranging from coal mines to freezing wastelands while delving deeper in search for unknown mysteries.

[list]

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/881100/extras/radioactive-vat.png?t=1675987871[/img]

[*][b]Pixel-based physics:[/b] Every pixel in the world is simulated. Burn, explode or melt anything. Swim in the blood of your foes! Enter a simulated world that is more interactive than anything you've seen before.

[*][b]Your own magic:[/b] Combine spells to create your own magic as you delve deeper into the caverns. Use magic to crush your enemies and manipulate the world around you.

[*][b]Procedurally generated world:[/b] Explore a unique world every time you play. Discover new environments as you adventure deeper.

[img]https://shared.akamai.steamstatic.com/store_item_assets/steam/apps/881100/extras/cover-shooter2.png?t=1675987871[/img]

[*][b]Action roguelite:[/b] Death is permanent and always a looming threat. When you die, don’t despair, use what you’ve learned to get further on your next adventure.

[/list]

[b]Noita[/b] is being developed by Nolla Games, a company set up by 3 indie developers, all of whom have worked on their own projects in the past.

The three gents in question are:

[b]Petri Purho[/b]
Petri is best known as the creator of [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/26900/Crayon_Physics_Deluxe/]Crayon Physics Deluxe[/url]. In his youth he also made a lot tiny freeware games. He has also made a bunch of board games, but he hasn't told about it to anyone. So please keep it a secret.

[b]Olli Harjola[/b]
Olli is known for the award-winning, mind-bending sci-fi puzzler [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/231160/The_Swapper/]The Swapper[/url]. Besides indie games, he also dabbles in music, live visuals and making programming languages.

[b]Arvi Teikari[/b]
Arvi is also known as Hempuli. Over the years he has released a lot of tiny experimental games, so many in fact that he is unaware of all of them. One of the games he remembers making is [url=https://store.steampowered.com/app/736260/Baba_Is_You/]Baba Is You[/url].
